## useful-array-functions-2 package

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [collect(numElems, creatorCallback)](./useful-array-functions-2.collect.md) | Create an array populated by the results of a given number of calls to a given creator function. |
|  [repeat(numReps, callbackFn)](./useful-array-functions-2.repeat.md) | Repeatedly perform a given action, a given number of times, for its side effects. The callback's return values will be ignored (and should always be undefined) |
|  [zip(inputArr1, inputArr2)](./useful-array-functions-2.zip.md) | Combine the elements of two given arrays into a single array of pairs. If the input arrays are not the same length, excess elements will be ignored. |
